subject: p18224196
History: Year old woman with secondary pulmonary hypertension on amiodarone therapy, amiodarone toxicity screening amiodarone toxicity screening.
Impression: Patient has had median sternotomy and mitral valve replacement and tricuspid valvular surgery. Lungs are hyperinflated but clear. Heart is not enlarged. Small bilateral pleural effusions are stable, probably not clinically significant. There no findings in the lungs to suggest amiodarone toxicity.
